unauthorized_status.msg: You Are Not Authorized To Perform This Action

payment_required.msg: You Must Pay To Perform This Action

forbidden_request.msg: You are not allowed to access this resource

not_found.msg: You are not trying to access invalid route

must_be_get.msg: You must use GET method to perform this action

must_be_post.msg: You must use POST method to perform this action

must_be_put.msg: You must use PUT method to perform this action

must_be_Delete.msg: You must use DELETE method to perform this action

CONFLICT.msg: You are trying to perform action that is already exist
